snippet: With votes not yet cast in Iowa, Mitt Romney has been buying up air time in Florida.
abstract: With votes not yet cast in Iowa, Mitt Romney has been buying up air time in Florida.
lead_paragraph: 12:12 p.m. | Updated DES MOINES - With the political world's attention focused on Iowa, Mitt Romney's campaign is looking several steps ahead and turning to Florida, where it is buying up time on broadcast television in that voter-rich primary state.

headline.main: Feet in Iowa, Eye on Florida
